attributes.action: bring in a  legal limit to the maximum temperature for indoor workplaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst there is a minimum temperature below which no one should have to work, there is no legal maximum. Say NO to another summer of 40 degree offices!

30 degrees celsius (86 Fahrenheit) is commonly recognised as a sensible maximum temperature.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
